title: Over 900 Authors Lend Their Names To A Letter Backing Hachette
teaser: Douglas Preston wrote an open letter supporting book publisher Hachette in its dispute with Amazon, which has since spread among his readers and throughout the literary community. More than 900 other writers have signed on, including John Grisham and Stephen King.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
